block.name: Probe Function
block.import: from grc_gnuradio import blks2 as grc_blks2
block.doc: Polls a function of an arbitrary block and writes the value to the output port. \ The block id is the id of another block in the flow graph. \ The function name is the name of a function in the said block. \ The function should take no arguments and return a floating point or integer number.
